item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Saturday, March 29, 2025 at 5:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Show HN: Physical Pomodoro Timer with ESP32 and e-paper screen (203 points | 46 comments)
2. New Windows 11 build makes mandatory Microsoft sign-in even more mandatory (54 points | 21 comments)
3. Real Time Chess – A physical chess board without the concept of turns (39 points | 10 comments)
4. Plain – a web framework for building products with Python (224 points | 128 comments)
5. Chimpanzees act as 'engineers', choosing materials to make tools (70 points | 51 comments)
6. Low responsiveness of ML models to critical or deteriorating health conditions (56 points | 23 comments)
7. We hacked Gemini's Python sandbox and leaked its source code (at least some) (584 points | 120 comments)
8. Mathematical Compact Models of Advanced Transistors [pdf] (65 points | 15 comments)
9. Show HN: Bknd – Firebase alternative that embeds into any React stack (29 points | 10 comments)
10. Koto Programming Language (94 points | 83 comments)
11. Playstation Mod Turns the PSOne into a Crustacean (87 points | 17 comments)
12. ASML's boss has a warning for Europe (7 points | 2 comments)
13. The Matrix Calculus You Need for Deep Learning (18 points | discuss)
14. Show HN Pianoboi – displays sheet music as you play your piano (79 points | 19 comments)
15. Digital Echoes and Unquiet Minds (149 points | 73 comments)
16. Caido – A lightweight web security auditing toolkit (9 points | 1 comment)
17. Beyond Bohr and Einstein (14 points | 1 comment)
18. Et Tu, Grammarly? (191 points | 41 comments)
19. Optimizing Matrix Multiplication on RDNA3 (109 points | 19 comments)
20. Decomposing a Factorial into Large Factors (123 points | 25 comments)
21. Show HN: Hexi – Modern header-only network binary serialisation for C++ (101 points | 38 comments)
22. xAI has acquired X, xAI now valued at $80B (707 points | 1020 comments)
23. Why I'm No Longer Talking to Architects About Microservices (53 points | 36 comments)
24. How to write blog posts that developers read (519 points | 147 comments)
25. Emulating the YM2612: Part 1 – Interface (30 points | 1 comment)
26. You Need Subtyping (59 points | 65 comments)
27. Rubik's Cube Solutions, Puzzles, and 8-Balls (2023) (4 points | discuss)
28. The Real Book (2021) (136 points | 32 comments)
29. Postgres Language Server: Initial Release (204 points | 30 comments)
30. Bolt Graphics Zeus a New GPU Architecture with Up to 2.25TB of Memory and 800GbE (8 points | 1 comment)
